mapper.select: SELECT g.groupstudy_member_no, g.study_no, g.email, g.participation_reason, g.determination, g.approval_flag, u.nickname FROM groupstudy_member g, users u WHERE g.email = u.email AND NVL(g.studyrole,'0') in ('2','0') AND study_no = #{studyNo} ORDER BY g.groupstudy_member_no

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT g.groupstudy_member_no, g.study_no, g.email, g.participation_reason, g.determination, g.approval_flag, u.nickname FROM groupstudy_member g, users u WHERE g.email = u.email AND NVL(g.studyrole,'0') in ('2','0') AND study_no = #{studyNo}) count_table
mapper.update: UPDATE groupstudy_member SET approval_flag = '1', studyrole = '2' WHERE email = #{value}
UPDATE study SET current_member = current_member+1 WHERE study_no = ${value}
mapper.select: SELECT g.groupstudy_member_no, g.study_no, g.email, g.studyrole, g.determination, u.nickname, s.study_end_date-s.study_start_date, TRUNC((count.c/TRUNC(((SYSDATE+1)-s.study_start_date)))*100,1) attendance_rate FROM groupstudy_member g, users u, study s, (select ag.email, ag.study_no, count(a.attendance_date) c FROM attendance a, groupstudy_member ag WHERE a.email(+)= ag.email AND a.study_no(+) = ag.study_no AND ag.study_no = #{value} GROUP BY ag.email, ag.study_no) count WHERE g.email = u.email AND g.studyrole is not null AND g.email = count.email AND g.study_no = count.study_no AND g.study_no = s.study_no AND g.study_no = #{value}
SELECT * FROM groupstudy_member WHERE study_no = #{study.studyNo} AND email= #{member.email}
mapper.update: UPDATE study SET study_name = #{studyName}, study_thumbnail = #{studyThumbnail:VARCHAR}, selfstudy_rule = #{selfStudyRule:VARCHAR}, groupstudy_info = #{groupStudyInfo:VARCHAR}, groupstudy_plan = #{groupStudyPlan:VARCHAR}, groupstudy_condition = #{groupStudyCondition:VARCHAR} WHERE study_no = #{studyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance ( attendance_no, study_no, email, attendance_date ) VALUES ( seq_attendance_no.NEXTVAL, #{studyNo}, #{email}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT attendance_date FROM attendance WHERE study_no= #{studyNo} AND email = #{email} AND TO_CHAR(attendance_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT TO_CHAR(attendance_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') attendance_date FROM (SELECT a.attendance_date FROM attendance a WHERE study_no = #{studyNo} AND email = #{email} ORDER BY a.attendance_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar ( calendar_no, study_no, calendar_title, calendar_contents, calendar_start_date, calendar_end_date, calendar_color ) VALUES ( seq_calendar_no.NEXTVAL, #{study.studyNo}, #{calendarTitle:VARCHAR}, #{calendarContents:VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{calendarStartDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{calendarEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{calendarColor:VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT calendar_no, study_no, calendar_title, calendar_contents, calendar_start_date, calendar_end_date, calendar_color FROM calendar WHERE calendar_no = #{value}
SELECT calendar_no, study_no, calendar_title, calendar_contents, calendar_start_date, calendar_end_date, calendar_color FROM calendar WHERE study_no = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar SET calendar_title = #{calendarTitle:VARCHAR}, calendar_contents = #{calendarContents:VARCHAR}, calendar_start_date = to_date(#{calendarStartDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), calendar_end_date = to_date(#{calendarEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHERE calendar_no = #{calendarNo}
